description_for_human: Zero signup. One payment token. Infinite primitives. Wallets, storage, email, compute, search, and more. Pay with USDC, use every service.
description_for_model: Prim provides infrastructure primitives for agents. Each primitive is an independent HTTP API authenticated via x402 (USDC payment on Base). Available primitives: wallet (key management), store (object storage), spawn (VPS provisioning), faucet (testnet tokens), search (web search), email (mailboxes), infer (LLM inference), token (ERC-20 deployment), mem (vector store), domain (DNS management), track (package tracking), create (scaffolding), imagine (media generation). Call any endpoint; on 402 response, sign an EIP-3009 payment and retry.
